item.title: The Assad regime's fall has freed displaced Syrians stuck in a remote desert camp
item.description: More than 7,000 people had taken shelter in the Rukban camp, near the border with Jordan, many of whom fled the regime and ISIS attacks almost a decade ago.

item.title: Starbucks baristas' 'strike before Christmas' has reached hundreds of U.S. stores
item.description: Starbucks' union says workers are walking off the job at some 300 — out of over 10,000 — stores across the U.S. as contract negotiations falter. The company urges it to return to the bargaining table.

item.title: 2023 was extremely hot. Then came 2024
item.description: It's looking like 2024 will be the hottest year since record-keeping began, unseating 2023 for the top spot. Climate change is playing a role, and scientists say it was even hotter than expected.
